roleset.name: handle, manually handling
roleset.note: MANIPULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for "manipulate" based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls 59. No comparison. (from manipulate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: a little artificial?
example.text: John manipulated the deck of cards behind his back.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Knee manipulation under anesthesia is indicated for total knee arthroplasty.

roleset.name: force, influencing or tampering with
roleset.note: MANIPULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for "manipulate" based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls 59. No comparison. (from manipulate.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: passivized
example.text: ``People-1 are looking for an ability *trace*-1 to try and read the market, rather than be manipulated *trace*-1,'' said Dudley A. Eppel, manager of equity trading at Donaldson, Lufkin& Jenrette.

example.name: all args
example.text: John manipulated Mary into eating a live goldfish.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Iago's manipulation of Desdemona occurs through Cassio.
